text: læa chaw yiw di klaw wa xu sayr pen butr khx ngxallxhˌ læa chaw khrist di klaw wa xal-ma sihˌ pen butr khx ngxallxhˌ nan khux thxykha thi phwk khea klaw khun dwy pak khxng phwk khea xeng sung khlay kab thxykha khxng brrda phu thi di ptiseth kar sraththa ma kxn khx xallxhˌ thrng laxˌnat phwk khea dwy theid phwk khea thuk hanhe pi di xyangri
